title: Lag Issues (OCE)
body:
So, for the past 6 months or so League has had a bunch of ping spikes, and even consists for the whole game. I understand that sometimes it is me (because parents are sometimes using the internet) but alot of the time it isn't. I just wanted to ask is there any way to reduce ping, or stop it or maybe is riot doing something to make the ping heavy? Because I am really suffering for it. And for the past day I have not been off 200 ping for the entire day.
Thank you~ {{champion:432}} {{summoner:31}} {{item:3070}} (Sorry first time writing a discussion, wanted to try it out c: )

Stay frosty <3

replies.body:
I recently transferred to OCE after NA became untenable with the server move. It seems like I have 130ms half of the time (definitely playable) and 230ms the other half (unplayable and makes me angry that I spent money to transfer in the first place). 

Anyone else experience this? Are the OCE servers split between two places?
I'm having lag spike issues today as well.  It's not a constant high ping, but spikes of 200-676 pings every few seconds in ARAM, CO-Op
Yup, exaclty that throughout the entire day.
Except it has been completly through the day.
Yep its still unbearably laggy even now...  Rebooted router and everything.  All comps within network are affected.  Other online games are not affected.
